duck: Plant propagation, the production of more plants by seeds, cuttings, grafting or other methods
Propaganda - Propaganda is a form of communication that is aimed at influencing the attitude of a community toward some cause or position.
Radio propagation, the application of wave propagation to radio communications
Software propagation, the distribution of free software in a manner explicitly permitted under the applicable license
propagation definition: the act or action of propagating.
Reproduction, and other forms of multiplication or increase
Wave propagation, The motion of a wave throughout a medium or the transfer of its energy

wiki.text:
'Propagation' can refer to: *Reproduction, and other forms of multiplication or
increase **Plant propagation, the production of more plants by seeds, cuttings,
grafting or other methods **Propagation of schema, in artificial reproduction
*Wave propagation, The motion of a wave throughout a medium or the transfer of
its energy *Radio propagation, the application of wave propagation to radio
communications *Software propagation, the distribution of free software in a
manner explicitly permitted under the applicable license *Propaganda
wiki.title: Propagation
